name: MonoChrome Rabbit
description:
An endless casual shooter game for serious PC users. A fun way to kill time and some annoying flying bugs. Your main character is a black rabbit armed with a gun.... A powerful that destroys enemies. But the enemies keep multiplying and the poor rabbit has to kill them all or he'll be killed!

Reskin and Improvement of Shooter Rabbit 2D by the same developer. Monochrome Rabbit is packed with better sound effects, a tutorial level, an achievements leaderboard, boss fights and particle effects.

This game is also part of a training course on nocode game development, where the developer teaches you how to build this game exactly from scratch step by step. Contact the developer on Twitter @bluetrypodgames for more info.
